Text:
If there is somebody out there who actually have this torrent, can you please seed!!! I have been looking for this album for a loooong time now.

Here is some info just in case somebody wonders about this band:

Death Piggy are generally referred to as GWAR before the costumes. Comprising of several members of GWAR, they merged with another local band, The Slave Pit. They formed in 1982 and were a small-time punk band in the Richmond, Virginia.

Here is some more info: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death_Piggy
